name: Deadly Crabs Of Death
description:
DCOR (inspired by one of the best puzzle games DROD) is an action puzzle game where your goal is to slay all crabs on level using uniquely controllable sword

Time moves when you move

Controls:

wasd to move player  

left and right arrow to move sword

R to restart

Z to undo (works badly, but can help a lot!!)

T to wait

Game by me GrabeR

Art by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

Made for Mini game jam 108
